translation.en: ♪ Koa- la- la ♪
translation.ja: NETFLIX オリジナルシリーズ

translation.en: It's one of my favorite times of the year on the island.
translation.ja: いまは私の好(す)きなきせつ

translation.en: It's baby koala season!
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんのきせつよ

translation.en: Lots of little koala babies have been hanging out with their mums in the trees.
translation.ja: たくさんの赤ちゃんコアラが ママにつかまってる

translation.en: But because it's been so hot and dry, koalas need our help now more than ever.
translation.ja: でも かんそうしてるから 助(たす)けがひつようなの

translation.en: It's okay. You're safe with us now.
translation.ja: もう心配(しんぱい)いらないよ

translation.en: Mum, Dad, and I have been rescuing lots of koalas
translation.ja: 両親(りょうしん)と一緒(いっしょ)に コアラを助(たす)けて

translation.en: and bringing them home to our koala hospital…
translation.ja: コアラの病院(びょういん)に入れるの

translation.en: …where we treat them
translation.ja: ごはんをあげて―

translation.en: and release them back into the wild when they're ready.
translation.ja: いつか野生(やせい)にかえすの

translation.en: There's the tree! This is your new home.
translation.ja: この木が あたらしいおうちよ

translation.en: - Whoa! - Have fun!
translation.ja: わあ たのしんで

translation.en: That's it, sweet!
translation.ja: そのちょうしよ

translation.en: - Bye, Juliet! - Bye, Juliet! See ya!
translation.ja: ジュリエット バイバイ

translation.en: Right now, we've got StormBoy,
translation.ja: この子はストームボーイ

translation.en: Mango,
translation.ja: マンゴー

translation.en: Muffin and Cinderella,
translation.ja: マフィンとシンデレラ

translation.en: Miss Piggy…
translation.ja: ミス･ピギー

translation.en: and lots and lots of babies!
translation.ja: ほかにも たくさんいる

translation.en: Chompy, come back!
translation.ja: チョンピー

translation.en: Teddy, where are you going?
translation.ja: テディ おいで

translation.en: This is the koala nursery.
translation.ja: コアラのほいくえん

translation.en: And we have four baby koalas that we're caring for at the moment.
translation.ja: いまいる赤ちゃんは４ひき

translation.en: They all lost their mums.
translation.ja: ママがいないから

translation.en: So they need each other to learn from and to get koala cuddles.
translation.ja: おたがい教(おし)え合(あ)ったり だっこがひつようなの

translation.en: This is Chompy.
translation.ja: チョンピーよ

translation.en: He went from being our smallest baby to our biggest baby.
translation.ja: この中で一番(いちばん)大きい男の子

translation.en: He's the boss.
translation.ja: ボスなの

translation.en: This is Teddy.
translation.ja: テディよ

translation.en: He's one of the shier babies.
translation.ja: とてもシャイな子なの

translation.en: This is Pumpkin.
translation.ja: この子はパンプキン

translation.en: She's our tiniest baby.
translation.ja: 一番(いちばん)小さい女の子よ

translation.en: She's small, but she's feisty.
translation.ja: 小さいけど元気(げんき)なの

translation.en: Twinkle.
translation.ja: トゥインクル

translation.en: Do you have yourself a Pumpkin?
translation.ja: パンプキンをおんぶしてる

translation.en: Twinkle's really patient and she acts like a mum to the other babies.
translation.ja: トゥインクルは ほかの子のママみたい

translation.en: We are very, very busy at the moment.
translation.ja: コアラがたくさんいて いそがしいわ

translation.en: Um… Excuse me, Chompy!
translation.ja: こらこら

translation.en: Four babies of this size is the most that we've ever had.
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんが４ひきもいるのは はじめて

translation.en: Having youngsters in care is always...
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんのせわには とても時間(じかん)がかかるの

translation.en: always takes a lot more time because we have to feed them milk.
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんのせわには とても時間(じかん)がかかるの ミルクをあげたり

translation.en: We've got to make sure they've got the freshest leaf.
translation.ja: しんせんな はっぱを よういしたり

translation.en: We have to work as a team to make sure that everything is done,
translation.ja: みんなで協力(きょうりょく)して めんどうを見るの

translation.en: and we just need to make sure we're doing the right thing.
translation.ja: まちがえないようにしなきゃ

translation.en: Oh my goodness! What is going on here?
translation.ja: まあ すごくちらかってる

translation.en: It's a koala party.
translation.ja: パーティーね

translation.en: Hello, babies!
translation.ja: みんな元気(げんき)？

translation.en: What a whole bundle of trouble.
translation.ja: いたずらっ子ね

translation.en: - Here, Iz, I'll give you the milk. - I'll do Twinkle.
translation.ja: ミルクよ 私(わたし)はトゥインクル

translation.en: Okay, I will do Teddy.
translation.ja: じゃあ 私(わたし)はテディ

translation.en: Oh my goodness! Come on!
translation.ja: こっちへ いらっしゃい

translation.en: - Here it is. - Pumpkin, can I please borrow Twinkle?
translation.ja: トゥインクルをかして

translation.en: I won't be long. I promise.
translation.ja: すぐに かえすから

translation.en: Why don't you go annoy Chompy?
translation.ja: チョンピーと遊(あそ)んでて

translation.en: Oh! Go and annoy Chompy.
translation.ja: チョンピーをよろしく

translation.en: Oh! You little monkey!
translation.ja: まあ おさるさんみたい

translation.en: I have to go kind of fast with Twinkle because she laps it.
translation.ja: トウィンクルには 急(いそ)いであげなきゃ

translation.en: Excuse me, Chompy, where are you taking Pumpkin?
translation.ja: チョンピー どこにいくの？

translation.en: Don't forget you have Pumpkin on your back
translation.ja: パンプキンが せなかに のってるよ

translation.en: and you're squishing her!
translation.ja: つぶれちゃいそう

translation.en: Chompy, you are so naughty!
translation.ja: チョンピーは いたずらっ子ね

translation.en: This year, baby season, it's gone very, very dry and very hot.
translation.ja: 今年(ことし)は とてもあつくて かんそうしてるの

translation.en: In the wild, the babies,
translation.ja: 野生(やせい)のコアラは

translation.en: normally they'd be clinging on to Mum all the time.
translation.ja: いつもママにくっついてる

translation.en: But being in the full force of the sun,
translation.ja: でも 太陽(たいよう)があつすぎると

translation.en: mums are getting really exhausted and sometimes the babies get lost.
translation.ja: ママは つかれるの そうすると赤ちゃんが

translation.en: That's when we need to help them.
translation.ja: まいごになることがある

translation.en: We've got our hands full at the moment. I'm not really sure we could handle any more than this.
translation.ja: いま赤ちゃんが多(おお)いから ふえたら たいへん

translation.en: Oh! We've had a Pumpkin down!
translation.ja: おちちゃった！

translation.en: I think everybody's ready for a nap.
translation.ja: おひるねの時間(じかん)ね

translation.en: - Should we get them back to bed? - Yeah.
translation.ja: ベッドに そうね

translation.en: Good night, Teddy. Good night, Twinkle.
translation.ja: テディ トゥインクル おやすみ

translation.en: Good night, Pumpkin and Chompy.
translation.ja: パンプキンとチョンピーも

translation.en: Sleep well!
translation.ja: よく ねてね

translation.en: - Hey, Izzy! - Yeah?
translation.ja: イジー はーい

translation.en: We've had a call about a baby koala.
translation.ja: コアラを助(たす)けにいくよ

translation.en: Oh, okay!
translation.ja: わかった

translation.en: - Go! - All right. Stay there, Loki!
translation.ja: ロキ そこにいてね

translation.en: It's so hot out there that we need to get cracking.
translation.ja: 外(そと)はあついから 急(いそ)がなくちゃ

translation.en: - Where's the koala? - We think he's near the Sphinx.
translation.ja: どこなの？ てんぼうだいの近(ちか)く

translation.en: That's a really long hike. We've got to hurry.
translation.ja: とおいから急(いそ)がなきゃ

translation.en: And the little baby is still separated from the mum in the middle of the heat.
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんがママから はなれちゃったの

translation.en: He's not safe where he is.
translation.ja: あぶないわ

translation.en: We can't really leave him there any longer.
translation.ja: 早く助(たす)けてあげなきゃ あぶない

translation.en: It's way too small to survive on its own.
translation.ja: 一人じゃ生きていけないわ

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.ja: いこう

translation.en: It's a long walk. It's at least two and a half kilometers.
translation.ja: とおいのよ 2.5キロは歩(ある)かなきゃ

translation.en: - - It's really dry.
translation.ja: かわいてる

translation.en: - It is dry, isn't it? - It's so dry.
translation.ja: 本当(ほんとう)に かんそうしてるわね

translation.en: Is the lady who found him still with the baby?
translation.ja: 女の人が見つけたの？

translation.en: Yeah, they're waiting for us.
translation.ja: そうよ まってるわ

translation.en: It's been now away from his mum for most of the day
translation.ja: １日くらい ママとはなれてる

translation.en: and it's really stinking hot, so he's going to need a drink.
translation.ja: とてもあついから お水を飲(の)ませてあげなきゃ

translation.en: We're almost there.
translation.ja: もう つく

translation.en: - Hey! - Hi!
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: He's over here.
translation.ja: あそこです

translation.en: It's tiny!
translation.ja: ちっちゃい

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.ja: そうだね

translation.en: - Thanks ever so much, ladies. - Thank you!
translation.ja: ご連絡 (れんらく)ありがとう

translation.en: All right. Oh. No worries.
translation.ja: 心配(しんぱい)ないわ

translation.en: Hi! It's okay.
translation.ja: こんにちは　もう大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)だよ

translation.en: He should definitely still be with the mum.
translation.ja: ママがひつようよ

translation.en: Oh, yeah, definitely. He's so tiny.
translation.ja: まだ小さいから そうね

translation.en: He's smaller than any of the other babies we have at home.
translation.ja: うちのコアラの中で 一番(いちばん) 小さい

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.ja: 安心(あんしん)して

translation.en: Just cuddle him. That's it.
translation.ja: だっこしてあげて

translation.en: - I've got you. - That's it.
translation.ja: 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)よ

translation.en: There you go.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: I think we really need to race him home now and go and get some milk into him.
translation.ja: 急(いそ)いで いえにかえって ミルクをあげなきゃ

translation.en: Do you want my hat, Iz, to keep him in the shade?
translation.ja: 私(わたし)のぼうしを つかう？

translation.en: - Yes, please. - You could put my hat over.
translation.ja: おねがい

translation.en: He's grabbing on to me pretty tight.
translation.ja: きつく つかんでる

translation.en: That's a really good sign.
translation.ja: 元気(げんき)なしるしね

translation.en: Yeah. I think he must be trusting you now.
translation.ja: あなたを信用(しんよう)してる

translation.en: Let's get this baby home.
translation.ja: 急(いそ)いで かえろう

translation.en: I think he's really dehydrated because it's so dry and hot.
translation.ja: あつかったから のどがかわいてると思(おも)う

translation.en: This one really needs milk.
translation.ja: ミルクがひつようよ

translation.en: All right, Iz, I'll get him some milk.
translation.ja: イジー ミルクよ

translation.en: This one's so tiny and it was just so very hot up there.
translation.ja: 小さいのに あついところで大変(たいへん)だった

translation.en: He needs milk. If I can't get him to take milk, I don't know how he's going to go.
translation.ja: ミルクが飲(の)めなかったら 生きられない

translation.en: Shall we?
translation.ja: さあ

translation.en: It's all right.
translation.ja: ママは獣医(じゅうい)さんだから 安心(あんしん)よ

translation.en: Mum's a wildlife vet. She's gonna give you some milk.
translation.ja: ママは獣医(じゅうい)さんだから 安心(あんしん)よ ミルクをあげる

translation.en: I know it's all strange, baby. It's very different.
translation.ja: ママのミルクとちがうけど 心配(しんぱい)ないよ

translation.en: You can do this.
translation.ja: がんばって

translation.en: This is gonna help you feel better.
translation.ja: 気分(きぶん)がよくなるよ

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)よ

translation.en: Good boy!
translation.ja: いい子ね

translation.en: That's pretty amazing. That's pretty quick going.
translation.ja: すごいわ　飲(の)むのがはやい

translation.en: Aw, look at his little tongue.
translation.ja: 舌(した)がかわいい

translation.en: What a smart little boy.
translation.ja: かしこい子ね

translation.en: That milk is so good for you.
translation.ja: ミルクは体(からだ)にいいよ

translation.en: I'm thinking of names.
translation.ja: 名前(なまえ)を考(かんが)えてる

translation.en: He's so brave. - Mm. - He's strong.
translation.ja: 勇気(ゆうき)があって つよい子だから―

translation.en: What about Ranger?
translation.ja: レンジャーは？

translation.en: I think that would suit him,
translation.ja: いいわね

translation.en: - surviving out in the wild by himself. - Yeah!
translation.ja: 一人で生き残(のこ)ってたから

translation.en: Mm, that's a good name.
translation.ja: いい名前(なまえ)よね

translation.en: This is the most koala babies that we've had in at one time.
translation.ja: コアラが いままでで一番(いちばん) 多(おお)い

translation.en: Now we're up to five.
translation.ja: ５ひきね

translation.en: Maybe we can start to slowly introduce him to some others.
translation.ja: ゆっくり しょうかいしよう まずトゥインクル

translation.en: Maybe Twinkle?
translation.ja: まずトゥインクル

translation.en: Because she's really calm and she sort of always acts like a mum.
translation.ja: とても おとなしいし ママみたいだから

translation.en: I think it'll help Ranger to have Twinkle to cuddle.
translation.ja: レンジャーを だっこしてくれると思(おも)う

translation.en: I think you're right, but right now he's very scared and fragile.
translation.ja: いいわね でも まだこわがってる

translation.en: Until he's stronger and more confident,
translation.ja: もう少(すこ)し つよくなったら

translation.en: he's not ready to meet Twinkle or any of the other babies.
translation.ja: ほかのコアラに 会(あ)わせましょう

translation.en: It all just depends on the type of night that he's had.
translation.ja: 今夜(こんや) ようすを見てからね

translation.en: - If he just settles… - Mm- hm.
translation.ja: しっかり おちついて

translation.en: …and he's calm and quiet and has a good sleep,
translation.ja: ゆっくりと ねられたら

translation.en: then maybe think about meeting somebody else.
translation.ja: だれかに会(あ)わせましょう

translation.en: Yeah. We'll let him sleep and then we'll check on him in the morning?
translation.ja: じゃあ ねかせて 朝 ようすを見るね

translation.en: Good morning, Ranger.
translation.ja: おはよう レンジャー

translation.en: How are you?
translation.ja: 元気(げんき)？

translation.en: - How is he doing, Iz? - Good.
translation.ja: ちょうしは？ いいよ

translation.en: - You want to try giving him a gentle feed? - Yeah.
translation.ja: ミルクを あげてみる？ うん

translation.en: Okay, here you go.
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: Good boy, Ranger.
translation.ja: えらいわね

translation.en: He looks so much better this morning.
translation.ja: きのうより元気(げんき)そう

translation.en: - He's a messy eater. - I know.
translation.ja: こぼすね そうね

translation.en: A lot of it is dripping down his chin.
translation.ja: あごに ついてる

translation.en: He's taking his milk really well.
translation.ja: ミルクを たくさん飲(の)んでる

translation.en: He slept really well last night.
translation.ja: ゆうべ よくねむれたのね

translation.en: I really want to introduce him to the other koalas.
translation.ja: ほかの子に会(あ)わせたい

translation.en: Twinkle, especially.
translation.ja: とくにトゥインクルに

translation.en: I think the more, like, warmth and cuddles that Twinkle can give him,
translation.ja: あの子なら レンジャーを おんぶしてくれる

translation.en: the more confident, less nervous,
translation.ja: 安心(あんしん)することができれば

translation.en: and the more safe he feels here, it will help him recover faster.
translation.ja: もっと早く 元気(げんき)になれると思(おも)う

translation.en: I'm not sure that this little boy is at that point yet.
translation.ja: まだ小さすぎるかもしれない

translation.en: A baby as small as Ranger can take up to a week
translation.ja: レンジャーくらいの子を

translation.en: before he might come out of his shell enough to want to meet anybody else.
translation.ja: ほかの子に会(あ)わせるには １週間(しゅうかん)は またないとね

translation.en: We just got to take it day by day.
translation.ja: ゆっくり やりましょう

translation.en: I have an idea, Mum.
translation.ja: いい考(かんが)えがある

translation.en: If I put him down
translation.ja: この子に―

translation.en: and maybe if I put the toy koala in front of him
translation.ja: コアラの ぬいぐるみを見せたら

translation.en: and Ranger's cuddling onto the toy koala,
translation.ja: それに乗(の)るかもしれない

translation.en: maybe it's a sign that we can introduce him.
translation.ja: そうしたら会(あ)わせてもいい？

translation.en: It'll let Ranger show us when he's ready.
translation.ja: それが あいずかも

translation.en: Yeah, that's possible.
translation.ja: そうかもね

translation.en: Ranger, you have to show me that you're confident enough
translation.ja: コアラのぬいぐるみに

translation.en: to walk over to the toy koala
translation.ja: 歩(ある)いていけるか見たいの

translation.en: so that you'll be able to meet a real- life koala like Twinkle.
translation.ja: もしできたら トゥインクルに会(あ)えるよ

translation.en: I think meeting Twinkle will help you feel happier.
translation.ja: 会(あ)えたら もっと たのしくなる

translation.en: You won't be as lonely.
translation.ja: さみしくなくなる

translation.en: Come on, Ranger. You can do this.
translation.ja: レンジャー　やってごらん

translation.en: You can tell that he's still quite scared.
translation.ja: まだ こわがってる

translation.en: He's not exploring. He's not curious enough yet.
translation.ja: 動(うご)こうとしないから まだ 興味(きょうみ)がわかないのね

translation.en: It doesn't matter how slow we go.
translation.ja: ゆっくりでいいよ

translation.en: I'll just make sure that you feel comfortable.
translation.ja: おちつくのを まってる

translation.en: We'll try again tomorrow.
translation.ja: また明日(あした)ね

translation.en: Ranger, look!
translation.ja: レンジャー 見て

translation.en: It's good that you're exploring.
translation.ja: ぼうけんするの？

translation.en: Do you think that you can climb up on this toy koala, Ranger?
translation.ja: ぬいぐるみに のぼれるかな？

translation.en: Wrong way.
translation.ja: ちがうよ

translation.en: We'll try again tomorrow.
translation.ja: また明日(あした)

translation.en: Are you ready today, Ranger?
translation.ja: 今日(きょう)は どうかな？

translation.en: You can do this.
translation.ja: できるよ

translation.en: Ranger, you're getting more curious.
translation.ja: 活発(かっぱつ)になってるね

translation.en: If you keep this up, you'll be able to meet Twinkle soon.
translation.ja: これならすぐに トゥインクルに会(あ)える

translation.en: We'll try again tomorrow.
translation.ja: また明日(あした)だね

translation.en: Come on, Ranger. I know you can do it.
translation.ja: 今日(きょう)は きっとできる

translation.en: I need to see that you're confident enough to meet Twinkle.
translation.ja: しっかりしてるから トゥインクルに会(あ)えるよ

translation.en: Keep going, Ranger. You're so close.
translation.ja: ぬいぐるみは すぐ近(ちか)くよ

translation.en: You can do this.
translation.ja: のぼれるよ

translation.en: Good job, Ranger.
translation.ja: よくできたね！

translation.en: That's so good. I'm so proud of you.
translation.ja: すごいわ よくがんばったね

translation.en: He's definitely happier. He's more confident.
translation.ja: 前(まえ)より おちついてると思(おも)う

translation.en: He went from being really curled up and small and sad
translation.ja: 最初(さいしょ)は こわがって まるまっていたけど

translation.en: to running over and jumping up onto something that he feels comfortable with.
translation.ja: 安心(あんしん)できそうなものに とび乗(の)ってる

translation.en: So, these are great signs that he's ready to meet Twinkle.
translation.ja: トゥインクルに会(あ)っても きっと大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)

translation.en: That was adorable.
translation.ja: かわいかった

translation.en: Let's introduce you to Twinkle.
translation.ja: じゃあ いこうか

translation.en: Are you excited, Ranger? You're gonna meet Twinkle today.
translation.ja: ワクワクする？ トゥインクルに会(あ)うよ

translation.en: Hey, little Twinkle. How you going, baby girl?
translation.ja: トゥインクル ちょうしはどう？

translation.en: You wanna go and meet Ranger?
translation.ja: レンジャーに会(あ)おう

translation.en: I think Twinkle's the perfect koala baby for you to meet.
translation.ja: トゥインクルは あなたに ぴったり

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: こっちよ

translation.en: She's kind, she's caring,
translation.ja: しんせつで やさしくて

translation.en: and she knows how you feel.
translation.ja: 気持(きも)ちを わかってくれる

translation.en: Hello!
translation.ja: ハロー

translation.en: Hello! Look who I've got.
translation.ja: さあ トゥインクルよ

translation.en: - Hi! - Shh.
translation.ja: いらっしゃい

translation.en: Ranger, meet Twinkle.
translation.ja: レンジャー　トゥインクルよ

translation.en: Twinkle, meet Ranger.
translation.ja: この子はレンジャー

translation.en: Ranger's very excited to see you.
translation.ja: あなたに会(あ)えて よろこんでる

translation.en: He's been waiting so long.
translation.ja: ずっと まってたのよ

translation.en: Twinkle, you need to be a really caring big sister to him
translation.ja: レンジャーは こわがってるから

translation.en: 'cause he's really scared.
translation.ja: めんどうを見てね

translation.en: Are you two just checking each other out by smelling each other?
translation.ja: においを かぎ合(あ)ってる

translation.en: - Maybe we can pop him next to Twinkle. - Yeah.
translation.ja: となりに おいてみよう

translation.en: Slowly, slowly. Yes.
translation.ja: ゆっくりとね

translation.en: That's it.
translation.ja: いいわよ

translation.en: Aw, good job, Ranger.
translation.ja: やったわ　レンジャー

translation.en: Twinkle's incredibly patient.
translation.ja: しんぼうづよいね

translation.en: She really is such a sweet girl.
translation.ja: トゥインクルは いい子ね

translation.en: Thank you, Twinkle, for looking after him.
translation.ja: めんどうを見てくれて ありがとう

translation.en: I think they're a pretty good match. Yeah?
translation.ja: ２ひきは いい組(く)み合(あ)わせね

translation.en: I think that's the face of contentment from Ranger.
translation.ja: まんぞくした かおをしてる

translation.en: Just the fact that he can now cuddle somebody else.
translation.ja: おんぶできたから 安心(あんしん)してる

translation.en: This is really going to help Ranger with his recovery,
translation.ja: これで早く 元気(げんき)になれると思(おも)う

translation.en: just like it has done for the other babies.
translation.ja: ほかの子たちも そうだった

translation.en: He's so comfortable that he's fallen asleep.
translation.ja: 安心(あいんしん)して ねちゃいそう

translation.en: That's exactly what he would do with his mum in the wild.
translation.ja: ママと一緒(いっしょ)にいるのと おなじね

translation.en: Yeah, he would. Just goes to show how important koala cuddles are.
translation.ja: コアラにおんぶして もらうのは 大事(だいじ)よ

translation.en: This is the sign of a happy koala.
translation.ja: 幸(しあわ)せそうな ねがおだね

translation.en: In this episode, you saw me and my family helping wild animals.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)たちが野生動物(やせいどうぶつ)を助(たす)ける 様子(ようす)を見てどうたったかな？

translation.en: If you see an animal that you think might be sick or injured,
translation.ja: もしどこかで怪我(けが)や病気(びょうき)の 動物(どうぶつ)を見つけたら

translation.en: don't approach it, tell an adult,
translation.ja: 近(ちか)づかないで 専門家(せんもんか)を呼(よ)んでって 大人の人に言(い)ってね

translation.en: and ask them to call a trained professional.
translation.ja: 専門家(せんもんか)を呼(よ)んでって 大人の人に言(い)ってね
